GKFeatureGameCenterAllowed.title: Allow use of Game Center
GKFeatureGameCenterAllowed.description: Set to false to disable Game Center.

GKFeatureAccountModificationAllowed.title: Allow Game Center account modification
GKFeatureAccountModificationAllowed.description: Set to false to disable account modifications.

GKFeatureAddingGameCenterFriendsAllowed.title: Allow adding Game Center friends
GKFeatureAddingGameCenterFriendsAllowed.description: Set to false to disable adding Game Center friends.

GKFeatureMultiplayerGamingAllowed.title: Allow multiplayer gaming
GKFeatureMultiplayerGamingAllowed.description: Set to false to disable multiplayer gaming.
